title: Mount
description: Vehicles or animals that aid in travel and carrying.

name.description: A descriptive name of what the mount is. i.e. Horse

nickname.description: The name of the mount. i.e. Wendy

type.description: Three options Biological, Mechanical, or Summon

speed.description: How fast the mount is able to travel

max_burden.description: How much the mount is capable of carrying, in weight

price.description: How much the mount is worth in currency

health.description: The amount of damage the mount can sustain before dying or breaking

description.description: The physical appearance of the mount
